remarks: Demonstration of a theorem (scheme) that requires (meta)variables ` x ` and ` z ` to be distinct, but no others.  It bundles the theorem schemes ` E. x ( x = x -> z e. x ) ` and ` E. x ( x = y -> y e. x ) ` .  Compare ~ dvdemo1 .  (Contributed by NM, 1-Dec-2006.)
statement:
dvdemo2 $p |- E. x ( x = y -> z e. x ) $.
$d x z $.
